EmailTemplate.description: Alert template used for LoanOps when a loan has been set to Declined or Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.name: UNUSED - Loan Withdrawn/Declined
EmailTemplate.subject: *Loan Ops - Loan Withdrawn or Declined*
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The status of {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name} has been changed to {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Stage__c} and {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Status__c} for relationship {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Account__c}
